hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:When Aisha intended to buy Barira, she said to the Prophet, "Barira's masters stipulated that they will have the Wala." The Prophet (ﷺ) said (to Aisha), "Buy her, as the Wala is for the one who manumits

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَرِثُ النِّسَاءُ مِنَ الْوَلاَءِ
chapter.eng-name: What a woman can inherit of the Wala’ (in the book it is given women)
